iep_goals: Navigate school building independently using visual maps and landmarks with 90% accuracy
Complete daily living skills tasks (organizing materials, following schedules) with minimal prompting in 8 out of 10 trials
accommodations: Large print materials and high contrast texts
Orientation and mobility support in unfamiliar environments
Extended time for assignments requiring visual processing
learning_styles: learns effectively through auditory instruction and discussion
benefits from hands-on, tactile learning experiences

interviews.parent: Parent reports Carlos is determined and independent but sometimes needs help navigating new situations.
interviews.teacher: Carlos is an engaged student who advocates well for his needs and excels in verbal discussions.

observations.psychologist: Average cognitive abilities with strong compensation strategies for visual processing challenges. Demonstrates good self-advocacy skills.
